tutorial: How to set up a new Chart
type: Adding Charts - The data you want to see

definition.text: You control the flow of data.

paragraphs.text: The granularity of the Data Storage hierarchy means that you can access Data Products in any combination. Do you want to see data from two different exchanges on the same market? Easily possible. Do you want to see data from two similar markets side by side? Piece of cake! The combinations of data you can view within your charts is truly up to your imagination.
Whew! I am getting a little carried away. My friends will cover these exciting possiblities in a little while. Let's refocus and finish adding those Data Mine Products.
